reviews.review_msg: Seemed like an okay class and I cruised along to a decent mark. She did ramble on at times about information and history figures which weren't relevant to the course but it was kind of interesting for general knowledge. I can't say much about ease of marking because the TA did all of mine   .

She was amazing. Extremely helpful and open, gives very constructive criticism. She was fun and gave us interesting and engaging assignments to complete. Really knew her stuff, too. Could ramble a little at times, but most profs do. Loved, loved, loved this class!

Her lectures are not organized and I feel like I'm given so much information not necessary for anything (not tested on later and not helpful or relevant to any assignments). She's UNCLEAR. I don't get what her lectures' main points are. If you don't LOVE world lit don't take it..love as in willing to die for it
